TextBlock.Text: NANOUK: Oeno discovered it while mining at site 2b
ZAMIO: Fascinating, we have thought this system uninhabitated, that we were the first to come here but this just proves one came bfore
NANOUK: Yes indeed, while this system is in its infacny, it clearly took the interest of some other traveller species
ZAMIO: It is times like this that i dearly miss our access to the CENTRAL REPOSITORY
NANOUK: Yes, but Coleus took a look and said it is no language he ever saw
ZAMIO: Fascinating, and am i right in thinking that even powered down it is emitting some kind of signal
NANOUK: Yes you are quite right, but it isn't continous, i have to wonder if it's part of a call and response, but our transoponedrs haven't picked anyhting up
ZAMIO: Then we just need a better transponder
NANOUK: Already on it, but research is focussed on the ATP, this will sadly have to wait
